title: The Way of Kings
summary: In a world of stone and storms, an unlikely hero discovers the lost magic of the Knights Radiant and fights to unite a fractured kingdom against a coming desolation.

title: Dune
summary: The story of a young nobleman's rise to power on a desert planet that is the only source of a priceless spice, exploring themes of politics, religion, and ecology.

title: Project Hail Mary
summary: An amnesiac astronaut wakes up on a solo mission in deep space, tasked with saving humanity from an extinction-level event with the help of an unexpected alien ally.

title: The Name of the Wind
summary: The tale of Kvothe, a gifted young man who grows to be the most notorious magician his world has ever seen. From a childhood in a troupe of traveling players, to years spent as an orphan in a crime-ridden city, to his daring bid to enter a legendary school of magic.

title: Mistborn: The Final Empire
summary: In a world where ash falls from the sky and mists rule the night, a young street urchin discovers she has a mysterious power and joins a crew of thieves to overthrow a god-like emperor.

title: Neuromancer
summary: A washed-up computer hacker is hired by a mysterious employer to pull off the ultimate hack. This novel is a cornerstone of the cyberpunk genre.

title: A Wizard of Earthsea
summary: A young boy named Ged, the greatest sorcerer in all of Earthsea, who was called Sparrowhawk in his reckless youth, comes to the island of Gont, a single mountain that rises from the sea.

title: The Hobbit
summary: A hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, is swept into an epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor from the fearsome dragon Smaug.

title: Words of Radiance
summary: As the world spirals into a new war, a scholar, a soldier, and a spy must navigate political intrigue and ancient secrets to prevent the return of the Voidbringers.

title: Hyperion
summary: On the eve of Armageddon, seven pilgrims set forth on a final voyage to Hyperion seeking the answers to the unsolved riddles of their lives.

title: The Martian
summary: An astronaut is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But he's alive and must find a way to signal to Earth that he's stranded on Mars.

title: The Wise Man's Fear
summary: Kvothe's adventures continue as he travels to distant lands, learns powerful magic, and uncovers more about the mysterious Chandrian.

title: The Well of Ascension
summary: After overthrowing the Lord Ruler, Vin and Elend struggle to keep their new kingdom from falling into chaos from threats both internal and external.

title: Snow Crash
summary: In a near-future America, a pizza delivery driver for the Mafia and a hacker named Hiro Protagonist investigates a new computer virus that is also a drug.

title: The Tombs of Atuan
summary: A young priestess in the service of the Nameless Ones has her world turned upside down by the arrival of the wizard Ged, who seeks a legendary treasure.

title: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, is entrusted with an immensely powerful Ring and must begin a perilous journey to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom.

title: Oathbringer
summary: Humanity faces a new Desolation with the return of the Voidbringers, a foe with numbers as great as their thirst for vengeance.

title: Children of Dune
summary: The children of Paul Atreides, Leto and Ghanima, contend with the political machinations of their aunt Alia and the future of the empire.

title: Ancillary Justice
summary: A soldier who was once a warship's AI seeks revenge for the destruction of her ship and crew.

title: The Lies of Locke Lamora
summary: In the island city of Camorr, a talented thief and his gang, the Gentleman Bastards, con their way through the nobility.

title: The Hero of Ages
summary: Vin and Elend fight to save their world from the encroaching mists and the dark god that controls them, leading to a cataclysmic final battle.

title: Altered Carbon
summary: In a future where consciousness can be digitized, a former soldier is downloaded into a new body to solve a mind-bogglingly complex murder.

title: The Farthest Shore
summary: Ged, now the Archmage, and a young prince must journey to the ends of the earth to discover why magic is fading from the world.

title: The Two Towers
summary: The fellowship is broken. Frodo and Sam must continue their journey to Mordor alone, while their companions face the armies of Saruman.
